meanings.definition: The state of being dissolute or indulging in immoral behavior.
meanings.sent1: Her dissolutenesses were evident in her constant partying and disregard for rules.
meanings.sent2: The town was shocked by the dissolutenesses of the new mayor.
meanings.sent3: Despite his dissolutenesses, he somehow managed to charm everyone he met.
meanings.sent4: The dissolutenesses of the crumbling building mirrored the decay of society.
meanings.sent5: The movie portrayed the dissolutenesses of the main character with stark realism.

meanings.definition: The quality of being lax or unrestrained in morals or conduct.
meanings.sent1: The teacher was concerned about the dissolutenesses of some students in the class.
meanings.sent2: His dissolutenesses led to his downfall in the end.
meanings.sent3: The cat's dissolutenesses in knocking things off the table amused the family.
meanings.sent4: The dissolutenesses of the storm left a trail of destruction in its wake.
meanings.sent5: The dissolutenesses of the wild party could be heard from miles away.
